title: ALL THE SMOKE NBA CHRISTMAS PREVIEW!
itunes:title: ALL THE SMOKE NBA CHRISTMAS PREVIEW!
description:
Matt and Stack are feeling festive so they acquire a Christmas Tree to get into the spirit before breaking down The Celtics vs Raptors, Bucks vs Sixers, Rockets vs Warriors, Clippers vs Lakers and finally Pelicans vs Nuggets. All The Smoke gets you ready for a great day and night of Christmas basketball!  

Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays from All The Smoke!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
